GP12vampsm_u:433: tvāmṛte pāpasaṅkalpa ko 'nya evaṃ vadiṣyati // VamPSm_8.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:434: ya ete bhavatā proktāḥ samastā daityadānavāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:442: śocyo 'haṃ yasya me gehe jātastava pitādhamaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:445: kṛṣṇe bhaktirahaṃ tāvadavekṣyo bhavatā na kim // VamPSm_8.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:447: iti jānātyayaṃ loko bhavāṃśca ditinandana // VamPSm_8.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:449: nindāṃ karoṣi tasya tvamakurvan gauravaṃ mama // VamPSm_8.43 //
GP12vampsm_u:453: yasmāt tasmādihaiva tvam aiśvaryād bhrāṃśameṣyasi // VamPSm_8.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:454: sa devo jagatāṃ nātho bale prabhurjanārdanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:455: nanvahaṃ pratyavekṣyaste bhaktimānatra me guruḥ // VamPSm_8.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:457: nāpekṣitastvayā yasmāt tasmācchāpaṃ dadāmi te // VamPSm_8.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:465: prasādayāmāsa guruṃ praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ // VamPSm_9.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:467: prasīda tāta mā kopaṃ kuru mohahate mayi /
GP12vampsm_u:472: viṣaṇṇo 'si yathā tāta tathaivāvinaye kṛte // VamPSm_9.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:474: sasāre durlabhāstāta guravo ye bhavadvidhāḥ // VamPSm_9.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:475: prasīda tāta mā kopaṃ kartumarhasi daityapa /
GP12vampsm_u:478: vatsa kopena me moho janitastena te mayā /
GP12vampsm_u:479: śāpo datto vivekaśca mohenāpahṛto mama // VamPSm_9.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:480: yadi mohena me jñānaṃ nākṣiptaṃ syānmahāsura /
GP12vampsm_u:481: tatkathaṃ sarvagaṃ jānan hariṃ kaccicchapāmyaham // VamPSm_9.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:482: yo yaḥ śāpo mayā datto bhavato 'surapuṅgava /
GP12vampsm_u:483: bhāvyametena nūnaṃ te tasmāttvaṃ mā viṣīda vai // VamPSm_9.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:485: bhavethā bhaktimānīśe sa te trātā bhaviṣyati // VamPSm_9.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:486: śāpaṃ prāpya ca me vīra deveśaḥ saṃsmṛtastvayā /
GP12vampsm_u:487: tathā tathā vadiṣyāmi śreyastvaṃ prāpsyase yathā // VamPSm_9.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:490: krameṇa hyudare devo vṛddhiṃ prāpto mahāyaśāḥ // VamPSm_9.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:491: tato māse 'tha daśame kāle prasava āgate /
GP12vampsm_u:492: ajāyata sa govindo bhagavān vāmanākṛtiḥ // VamPSm_9.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:496: dharme ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tadā matirajāyata // VamPSm_9.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:498: tadā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ dharme matirajāyata // VamPSm_9.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:500: jātakarmādikāṃ kṛtvā kriyāṃ tuṣṭāva ca prabhum // VamPSm_9.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:513: jaya sūkṣmātisūkṣma tvaṃ jayānindriya sendriya // VamPSm_9.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:517: sāmprataṃ jaya viśvātman māyāvāmana keśava // VamPSm_9.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:522: na tvāmahaṃ na ceśāno nendrādyāstridaśā hare /
GP12vampsm_u:523: jñātumīśā na munayaḥ sanakādyā na yoginaḥ // VamPSm_9.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:525: kastvāṃ vetsyati sarveśa tvatprasādaṃ vinā naraḥ // VamPSm_9.29 //
GP12vampsm_u:527: sa eva kevalaṃ devaṃ vetti tvāṃ netaro naja // VamPSm_9.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:531: elaṃ stuto hṛṣīkeśaḥ sa tadā vāmanākṛtiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:534: mayā ca vaḥ pratijñātamindrasya bhuvanatrayam // VamPSm_9.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:536: yathā śakrāya dāsyāmi trailokyaṃ hatakaṇṭakam // VamPSm_9.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:537: so 'haṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathendro jagataḥ patiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:538: bhaviṣyati sahasrākṣaḥ satyametad bravīmi vaḥ // VamPSm_9.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:540: yajñopavītaṃ bhagavān dadau tasya bṛhaspatiḥ // VamPSm_9.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:543: āsanaṃ caiva pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ pītavāsasī // VamPSm_9.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:546: sa vāmano jaṭī daṇḍī chatrī dhṛtakamaṇḍaluḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:548: yatra yatra padaṃ viprā bhūbhāge vāmano dadau /
GP12vampsm_u:557: tasya saṃdarśanādeva nāgebhyo na bhayaṃ bhavet // VamPSm_9.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:563: kasmācca nāsurān bhāgān pratigṛhṇanti vahnayaḥ // VamPSm_10.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:564: iti pṛṣṭo 'tha balinā kāvyo vedavidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:565: uvāca daityādhipatiṃ ciraṃ dhyātvā mahāmatiḥ // VamPSm_10.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:571: neyaṃ bhūtapatiṃ bhūmiḥ samarthā voḍhumīśvaram // VamPSm_10.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:578: bhuñjate nāsurān bhāgānapi tena trayo 'gnayaḥ // VamPSm_10.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:581: yajñamabhyāgato brahman mattaḥ ko 'nyo 'dhikaḥ pumān // VamPSm_10.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:587: tvayā tu dānavā daitya yajñabhāgabhujaḥ kṛtāḥ // VamPSm_10.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:588: ayaṃ ca devaḥ sattvasthaḥ karoti sthitipālanam /
GP12vampsm_u:589: visṛṣṭaṃ ca tathāyaṃ ca svayamatti prajāḥ prabhuḥ // VamPSm_10.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:590: bhavāṃstu vandī bhavitā nūnaṃ viṣṇuḥ sthitau sthitaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:591: viditvaivaṃ mahābhāgā kuru yat te manogatam // VamPSm_10.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:593: pratijñā naiva voḍhavyā vācyaṃ sāma tathāphalam // VamPSm_10.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:595: alaṃ dadyāṃ dhanaṃ deve tvetadvācyaṃ tu yācataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:601: sa me vakṣyati dehīti govindaḥkimato 'dhikam // VamPSm_10.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:603: yajñā kriyante yajñeśaḥ sa me dehīti vakṣyati // VamPSm_10.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:604: tatsādhu sukṛtaṃ karma tapaḥ sucaritaṃ canaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:605: yanmā dehīti viśveśaḥ svayameva vadiṣyati // VamPSm_10.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:607: prāṇatyāgaṃ kariṣye 'haṃ na tu nāsti jane kvacit // VamPSm_10.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:611: na bādhākāri yaddānaṃ tadaṅgaṃ balavat smṛtam // VamPSm_10.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:612: madrājye nāsukhī kaścinna daridro na cāturaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:613: na duḥkhito na cobdigno na śamādivivarjitaḥ // VamPSm_10.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:615: janaḥ sarvo mahābhāga kimutāhaṃ sadā sukhī // VamPSm_10.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:619: mama dānamavāpyāsau puṣṇāti yadi devatāḥ // VamPSm_10.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:621: janārdane mahāpātre kiṃ na prāptaṃ tato mayā // VamPSm_10.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:627: māṃ nihantuṃ tato hi syād vadhaḥ ślāghyataro 'cyutāt // VamPSm_10.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:629: naiva bhāvyaṃ jagannāthe govinde samupasthite // VamPSm_10.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:633: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ tu praviṣṭamasurāḥ prabhum /
GP12vampsm_u:634: jagmuḥ prabhāvataḥ kṣobhaṃ tejasā tasya niṣprabhāḥ // VamPSm_10.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:636: vasiṣṭho gādhijo gargo anye ca munisattamāḥ // VamPSm_10.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:638: tataḥ saṃkṣobhamāpanno na kaścit kiñciduktavān // VamPSm_10.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:640: athāsurapati prahvaṃ dṛṣṭvā munivarāśca tān // VamPSm_10.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:647: pūjayāmāsa govindaṃ prāha cedaṃ mahāsuraḥ // VamPSm_10.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:650: striyo vastrāṇyalaṅkārān gāvo grāmāśca puṣkalāḥ // VamPSm_10.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:651: sarve ca saralā pṛthvī bhavato vā yadīpsitam /
GP12vampsm_u:652: tad dadāsi vṛṇuṣveṣṭaṃ mamārthāḥ santi te priyāḥ // VamPSm_10.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:658: tribhiḥ prayojanaṃ kiṃ te padaiḥ padavatāṃ vara /
GP12vampsm_u:659: śataṃ śatasahasraṃ vā padānāṃ mārgatāṃ bhavān // VamPSm_10.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:664: vācayāmāsa vai tasmai vāmanāya mahātmane // VamPSm_10.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:667: cantrasūryau tu nayane dyauḥ śiraścaraṇau kṣitiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:672: tārakā romakūpāṇi romeṣu ca maharṣayaḥ // VamPSm_10.51 //
GP12vampsm_u:674: aśvinau śravaṇe tasya nāsā vāyurmahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_10.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:675: prasāde candramā devo mano dharmaḥ samāśritaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:676: satyamasyābhavad vāṇī jihvā devī sarasvatī // VamPSm_10.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:678: svargadvāramabhūnmaitraṃ tvaṣṭā pūṣā ca vai bhruvau // VamPSm_10.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:680: hṛdayaṃ ca paraṃ brahma puṃstvaṃ vai kaśyapo muniḥ // VamPSm_10.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:682: vakṣasthale tathā rudro dhairye cāsya mahārṇavaḥ // VamPSm_10.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:684: lakṣmīrmedhā dhṛtiḥ kāntiḥ sarvavidyāśca vai kaṭiḥ // VamPSm_10.57 //
GP12vampsm_u:687: tanau kukṣiṣu vedāśca jānunī ca mahāmakhāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:688: iṣṭayaḥ paśavaścāsya dvijānāṃ ceṣṭitāni ca // VamPSm_10.59 //
GP12vampsm_u:690: upasarpanti te daityāḥ pataṅgā iva pāvakam // VamPSm_10.60 //
GP12vampsm_u:694: kṛtvā rūpaṃ mahākāyaṃ saṃjahārāśu medinīm // VamPSm_10.62 //
GP12vampsm_u:704: yat tvayā salilaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā mayā // VamPSm_10.67 //
GP12vampsm_u:706: vaivakhate tathātīte kāle manvantare tathā // VamPSm_10.68 //
GP12vampsm_u:708: idānīṃ bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ dattaṃ śakrāya vai purā // VamPSm_10.69 //
GP12vampsm_u:710: niyantavyā mayā sarve ye tasya paripanthinaḥ // VamPSm_10.70 //
GP12vampsm_u:712: sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ samāsādya vaco mama // VamPSm_10.71 //
GP12vampsm_u:720: yāvatsuraiśca vipraiśca na virodhaṃ gamiṣyasi // VamPSm_10.75 //
GP12vampsm_u:722: yadā suraiśca vipraiśca virodhaṃ tvaṃ kariṣyasi /
GP12vampsm_u:723: bandhiṣyanti tadā pāsā vāruṇā ghoradarśanāḥ // VamPSm_10.76 //
GP12vampsm_u:727: āpyāyito yena deva smareyaṃ tvāmahaṃ sadā // VamPSm_10.77 //
GP12vampsm_u:730: hutānyaśraddhayā yāni tāni dāsyanti te phalam // VamPSm_10.78 //
GP12vampsm_u:732: phalāni tava dāsyanti adhītānyavratāni ca // VamPSm_10.79 //
GP12vampsm_u:733: udakena vinā pūjā vinā darbeṇa yā kriyā /
GP12vampsm_u:734: ājyena ca vinā homaṃ phalaṃ dāsyanti te bale // VamPSm_10.80 //
GP12vampsm_u:736: na tatra cāsuro bhāgo bhaviṣyati kadācana // VamPSm_10.81 //
GP12vampsm_u:738: ye ca śrāddhāni dāsyanti vrataṃ niyamameva ca // VamPSm_10.82 //
GP12vampsm_u:739: kriyā kṛtā ca yā kācid vidhināvidhināpi vā /
GP12vampsm_u:740: sarvaṃ tadakṣayaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_10.83 //
GP12vampsm_u:742: dvādaśyāṃ vāmanaṃ dṛṣṭvā snātvā viṣṇupade hvade /
GP12vampsm_u:743: dānaṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_10.84 //
GP12vampsm_u:746: vyāpinā tena rūpeṇa jagāmādarśanaṃ hariḥ // VamPSm_10.85 //
GP12vampsm_u:748: niḥśeṣaṃ ca tadā kālaṃ baliḥ pātālamāsthitaḥ // VamPSm_10.86 //
GP12vampsm_u:750: vāmanasya śṛṇvan yastu sarvapāṣaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_10.87 //
GP12vampsm_u:752: balerviṣṇośca caritaṃ ye smariṣyanti mānavāḥ // VamPSm_10.88 //
GP12vampsm_u:753: nādhayo vyādhayasteṣāṃ na ca mohākulaṃ manaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:756: samāpneti mahābhāgā naraḥ śrutvā kathāmimām // VamPSm_10.90 //
GP12vampsm_u:759: vāmanasya ca māhatmyaṃ śṛṇvan pāpaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_10.91 //
GP12vampsm_u:764: kathaṃ saraḥ samāsādya kṛtvā tīrthāni pārśvataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:766: etad vistarato brūhi tīrthaṃvaṃśaṃ sanātanam // VamPSm_11.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:771: praviṣṭā puṇyatoyaughā vanaṃ dvaitamiti smṛtam // VamPSm_11.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:772: tasmin palkṣe sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:773: praṇipatya tadā mūrdhnā tuṣṭāvātha sarasvatīm // VamPSm_11.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:774: tvaṃ devi sarvalokānāṃ mātā devāraṇiḥ śubhā /
GP12vampsm_u:776: tat sarvaṃ tvayi saṃyogi yogivad devi saṃsthitam /
GP12vampsm_u:777: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ devī yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12vampsm_u:778: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma viśvaṃ caitat kṣarātmakam // VamPSm_11.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:780: tathā tvayi sthitaṃ brahma jagaccedamaśeṣataḥ // VamPSm_11.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:782: tatra mātrātrayaṃ sarvamasti yad devi nāsti ca // VamPSm_11.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:784: trīṇi jyotīṃṣi vargāśca trayo dharmādayastathā // VamPSm_11.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:793: tavaitat paramaṃ rūpaṃ yanna śakyaṃ mayoditum /
GP12vampsm_u:794: na cāsyena na vā jihvātālvoṣṭhādibhirucyate // VamPSm_11.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:795: sa viṣṇuḥ sa vṛṣo brahma candrākrajyotireva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:800: anākhyaṃ ṣaḍguṇākhyaṃ ca bahvākhyaṃ triguṇāśrayam // VamPSm_11.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:802: sukhāt sukhaṃ mahātsaukhyaṃ rūpaṃ tattvaguṇātmakam // VamPSm_11.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:803: evaṃ devi tvayā vyāptaṃ sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ ca yat /
GP12vampsm_u:804: advaitāvasthitaṃ brahma yacca dvaite vyavasthitam // VamPSm_11.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:805: ye'rthā nityā ye vinaśyanti cānye ye'rthāḥ sthūlā ye tathā santi sūkṣmāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:806: ye vā bhūmau ye 'ntarikṣenyato vā teṣāṃ devi tvatta evopalabdhiḥ // VamPSm_11.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:807: yadvā mūrtaṃ yadamūrtaṃ samastaṃ yadvā bhūteṣvekamekaṃ ca kiñcit /
GP12vampsm_u:808: yacca dvaite vyastabhūtaṃ ca lakṣyaṃ tatsaṃbaddhaṃ tvatsvarairvyañjanaiśca // VamPSm_11.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:809: evaṃ stutā tadā devī viṣṇorjihvā sarasvatī /
GP12vampsm_u:811: yatra tvaṃ neṣyase vipra tatra yāsyāmyatandritā // VamPSm_11.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:813: ādyaṃ brahmasaraḥ puṇyaṃ tato rāmahvadaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:814: kuruṇā ṛṣiṇā puṣṭaṃ kurukṣetraṃ tataḥ smṛtam /
GP12vampsm_u:815: tasya madhyena vai gāḍhaṃ puṇyā puṇyajalāvahā // VamPSm_11.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:819: nadī pravāhasaṃyuktā kurukṣetraṃ viveśa ha // VamPSm_12.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:820: tatra sā rantukaṃ prāpya puṇyatoyā sarasvatī /
GP12vampsm_u:821: kurakṣetraṃ samāplāvya prayātā paścimāṃ diśam // VamPSm_12.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:826: ye smaranti ca tīrthāni devatāḥ prīṇayanti ca /
GP12vampsm_u:827: snānti ca śraddadhānāśca te yānti paramāṃ gatim // VamPSm_12.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:828: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā /
GP12vampsm_u:829: yaḥ smaret kurukṣetraṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // VamPSm_12.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:833: vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktiruktā caturvidhā // VamPSm_12.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:835: taṃ devanirmitaṃ deśaṃ brahmavartaṃ pracakṣate // VamPSm_12.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:837: evaṃ yaḥ satataṃ brūyāt so 'pi pāṣaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_12.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:839: tasya jñānaṃ brahmamayamutpatsyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_12.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:841: tasya saṃsevanānnityaṃ brahma cātmani paśyati // VamPSm_12.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:842: cañcalaṃ hi manuṣyatvaṃ prāpya ye mokṣakāṅkiṇaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:845: paśyanti nirmalaṃ devaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ sanātanam // VamPSm_12.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:846: brahmavediḥ kurukṣetraṃ puṇyaṃ sānnihitaṃ saraḥ // VamPSm_12.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:848: kurukṣetre mṛtānāṃ ca patanaṃ naiva vidyate // VamPSm_12.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:851: gatvā tu śraddhāyā yuktaḥ snātvā sthāṇumahāhvade /
GP12vampsm_u:852: manasā cintitaṃ kāmaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_12.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:853: niyamaṃ ta tataḥ kṛtvā gatvā saraḥ pradakṣiṇam /
GP12vampsm_u:854: rantukaṃ ca samāsādya kṣamayitvā punaḥ punaḥ // VamPSm_12.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:855: sarasvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā yakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇamya ca /
GP12vampsm_u:856: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ ca naivaidyaṃ datvā vācamudīrayet // VamPSm_12.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:857: tava prasādād yakṣendra vānāni saritaśca yāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:858: bhramiṣyāmi ca tīrthāni avighneṃ kuru me sadā // VamPSm_12.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:861: vanāni sapta no brūhi nava nadyaśca yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:862: tīrthāni ca samagrāṇi tīrthasnānaphalaṃ tathā // VamPSm_13.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:863: yena yena vidhānena yasya tīrthasya yat phalam /
GP12vampsm_u:864: tat sarvaṃ vistateṇeha brūhi paurāṇikottama // VamPSm_13.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:867: yeṣāṃ nāmāni puṇyāni sarvapāpaharāṇi ca // VamPSm_13.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:868: kāmyakaṃ ca vanaṃ puṇyaṃ tathāditivanaṃ mahat /
GP12vampsm_u:869: vyāsasya ca vanaṃ puṇyaṃ phalakīvanameva ca // VamPSm_13.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:872: vanānyetāni vai sapta nadīḥ śṛṇuta me dvijāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:873: sarasvatī nadī puṇyā tathā vaitaraṇī nadī // VamPSm_13.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:874: āpagā ca mahāpuṇyā gaṅgā mandākinī nadī /
GP12vampsm_u:880: tīrthasya ca prabhāveṇa puṇyā hyetāḥ saridvarāḥ // VamPSm_13.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:883: rantukaṃ ca naro dṛṣṭvā dvārapālaṃ mahābalam /
GP12vampsm_u:886: adityā yatra gutrārthaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoraṃ mahattapaḥ // VamPSm_13.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:887: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca aditiṃ devamātaram /
GP12vampsm_u:891: savanaṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃnihito hariḥ // VamPSm_13.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:892: vimale ca naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca vimaleśvaram /
GP12vampsm_u:893: nirmalaṃ svargamāyāti rudralokaṃ ca gacchati // VamPSm_13.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:897: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca brahmāṇaṃ vedasaṃyutam // VamPSm_13.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:900: saṃgame ca naraḥ snātvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:902: kṣāntiyukto naraḥ snātvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:904: sarvāṇi kṣamate tasya snātamātrasya dehinaḥ // VamPSm_13.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:905: tato dakṣāśramaṃ gatvā dṛṣṭvā dekṣeśvaraṃ śivam /
GP12vampsm_u:906: aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // VamPSm_13.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:907: tataḥ śālūkinīṃ gatvā snātvā tīrthe dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:911: tatra snānaṃ naraḥ kṛtvā mukto nāgabhayād bhavet // VamPSm_13.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:912: tato gaccheta viprendrā dvārapālaṃ tu rantukam /
GP12vampsm_u:913: tatroṣya rajanīmekāṃ snātvā tīrthavare śubhe // VamPSm_13.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:915: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā ca praṇipatya kṣamāpayet // VamPSm_13.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:916: tava prasādād yakṣendra mukto bhavati kilbiṣaiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:918: evaṃ prasādya yakṣendraṃ tataḥ pañcanadaṃ vrajet // VamPSm_13.26 //
GP12vampsm_u:920: tatra sarveṣu lokeṣu tīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ smṛtam // VamPSm_13.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:923: tasmin tīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā koṭīśvaraṃ haram /
GP12vampsm_u:926: tatrāpi ca naraḥ snātvā hyagniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_13.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:928: rūpasya bhāgī bhavati yaśasvī ca bhavennaraḥ // VamPSm_13.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:930: tasmin snātvā śraddadhānaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:933: tatra someśvare dṛṣṭvā snātvā tīrthavare śubhe /
GP12vampsm_u:934: rājasūyasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // VamPSm_13.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:938: tāvubhau liṅgāvabhyarcya na bhūyo janma cāpnuyāt // VamPSm_13.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:942: tato muñjavaṭaṃ nāma mahādevasya dhīmataḥ // VamPSm_13.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:944: tatraiva ca mahāgrāhī yakṣiṇī lokaviśrutā // VamPSm_13.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:949: puṣkaraṃ ca tato gatvā abhyarcya pitṛdevatāḥ // VamPSm_13.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:951: kṛtakṛtyo bhaved rājā aśvamedhaṃ ca vindati // VamPSm_13.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:952: kanyādānaṃ ca yastatra kārtikyāṃ vai kariṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:955: vighnaṃ karoti pāpānāṃ durgati ca prayacchati // VamPSm_13.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:957: āhatya dundubhiṃ tatra bhramate nityameva hi // VamPSm_13.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:958: sā dadarśa striyaṃ caikāṃ saputrāṃ pāpadeśajām /
GP12vampsm_u:959: tāmuvāca tadā yakṣī āhatya niśi dundubhim // VamPSm_13.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:961: tadvad bhūtālaye snātvā saputrā vastumicchasi // VamPSm_13.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:962: divā mayā te kathitaṃ rātrau bhakṣyāmi niścitam /
GP12vampsm_u:963: etacchrutvā tu vacanaṃ praṇipatya ca yakṣiṇīm // VamPSm_13.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:964: uvāca dīnayā vācā prasādaṃ kuru bhāmini /
GP12vampsm_u:965: tataḥ sā yakṣiṇī tāṃ tu provāca kṛpayānvitā // VamPSm_13.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:966: yadā sūryasya grahaṇaṃ kālena bhavitā kvacit /
GP12vampsm_u:967: saṃnihatyāṃ tadā snātvā pūtā svargaṃ kamiṣyasi // VamPSm_13.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:971: yatra rāmeṇa vipreṇa tarasā dīptatejasā // VamPSm_14.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:973: pūrayitvā naravyāghra rudhireṇeti naḥ śrutam // VamPSm_14.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:976: rāma rāma mahābāho prītāḥ smastava bhārgava /
GP12vampsm_u:977: anayā pitṛbhaktyā ca vikrameṇa ca te vibho // VamPSm_14.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:978: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te kimicchasi mahāyaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:979: evamuktastu pitṛbhī rāmaḥ prabhavatāḥ paraḥ // VamPSm_14.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:980: abravīt prāñjalirvākyaṃ sa pitṛn gagane sthitān /
GP12vampsm_u:981: bhavanto yadi me prītā yadya nugrāhyatā mayi // VamPSm_14.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:991: hradāśca tava tīrthatvaṃ gamīṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_14.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:992: hradeṣveteṣu ye snātvā svān pitṝṃstarpayanti ca /
GP12vampsm_u:993: tebhyo dāsyanti pitaro yathābhilaṣitaṃ varam // VamPSm_14.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:994: īpsitān mānasān kāmān svargavāsaṃ ca śāśvatam /
GP12vampsm_u:995: evaṃ dattvā varān viprā rāmasya pitarastadā // VamPSm_14.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:997: evaṃ rāmahradāḥ puṇyā bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_14.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:999: rāmamabhyarcya śraddhāvān vinded bahu suvarṇakam // VamPSm_14.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:1001: svavaṃśasiddhaye viprāḥ snātvā vai vaṃśamūlake // VamPSm_14.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:1010: lokā yatroddhatāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // VamPSm_14.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:1012: snātvātīrthavare tasmin lokān paśyati śāśvatān // VamPSm_14.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:1013: yatra viṣṇuḥ sthito nityaṃ śivo devaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1014: tau devau praṇipātena prasādya muktimāpnuyāt // VamPSm_14.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:1016: tatra snātasya sānnidhyaṃ sadā devī prayacchati // VamPSm_14.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:1018: tatra snātvār'cayitvā ca daivatāni pitṛstathā // VamPSm_14.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:1020: tatra sthitaṃ mahādevaṃ kāpilaṃ vapurāsthitam // VamPSm_14.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:1030: udgārāt surabhirjātā sā ca pātālamāśritā // VamPSm_14.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:1034: āhutā brahmaṇā tāśca vibhrāntā vivareṇa hi // VamPSm_14.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:1035: tasmin vivaradvāre tu sthito gaṇapatiḥ svayam /
GP12vampsm_u:1036: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā sakalān kāmān prāpnotisaṃyatendriyaḥ // VamPSm_14.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:1038: devyāstīrthe naraḥ snātvā labhate rūpamuttamam // VamPSm_14.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:1040: bhogāṃśca vipulān bhuktvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_14.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:1042: bhavate nātra sandehaḥ prāṇān muñcati svecchayā // VamPSm_14.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:1043: tato gaccheta viprendrā dvārapālaṃ tu rantukam /
GP12vampsm_u:1044: tasya tīrthaṃ sarasvatyāṃ yakṣendrasya mahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_14.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:1046: yakṣasya ca prasādena labhate kāmikaṃ phalam // VamPSm_14.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:1048: brahmāvarte naraḥ snātvā brahma cāpnoti niścitam // VamPSm_14.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:1050: tatra saṃnihitā nityaṃ pitaro daivataiḥ saha // VamPSm_14.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:1054: kāmeśvarasya tīrthaṃ tu snātvā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ // VamPSm_14.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:1056: mātṛtīrthaṃ ca tatraiva yatra snātasya bhaktitaḥ // VamPSm_14.43 //
GP12vampsm_u:1060: punāti darśanādeva daṇḍakaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // VamPSm_14.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:1061: keśānabhyukṣya vai tasmin pūto bhavati pāpataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1062: tatra tīrthavaraṃ cānyat svānulomāyanaṃ mahat // VamPSm_14.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:1066: pūtātmānaśca te viprāḥ prayānti paramāṃ gatim // VamPSm_14.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:1068: tatra snātvā bhaktiyuktastadeva labhate phalam // VamPSm_14.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:1070: darśanāt tasya tīrthasya mukto bhavati kilbiṣaiḥ // VamPSm_14.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:1073: tato vyādhāśca te sarve tānapṛcchan dvijottamān /
GP12vampsm_u:1074: mṛgā anena vai yātā asmābhiḥ śarapīḍitāḥ // VamPSm_14.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:1075: nimagnāste saraḥ prāpya kva te yātā dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1076: te 'bruvaṃstatra vai pṛṣṭā vayaṃ te ca dvijottamāḥ // VamPSm_14.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:1078: tasmād yūyaṃ śraddadhānāḥ snātvā tīrthe vimatsarāḥ // VamPSm_14.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:1080: tataḥ snātāśca te sarve śuddhadehā divaṃ gatāḥ // VamPSm_14.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:1082: ye śṛṇvanti śraddadhānāste 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim // VamPSm_14.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:1086: āpagā nāma vikhyātā nadī dvijaniṣevitā // VamPSm_15.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:1088: ye prayacchanti viprebhyasteṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate // VamPSm_15.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:1089: ye tu śrāddhaṃ kariṣyanti prāpya tāmāpagāṃ nadīm /
GP12vampsm_u:1090: te sarvakāmasaṃyuktā bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:1091: śaṃsanti sarve pitaraḥ smaranti ca pitāmahāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1092: asmākaṃ ca kule putraḥ pautro vāpi bhaviṣyati // VamPSm_15.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:1093: ya āpagāṃ nadīṃ gatvā tilaiḥ saṃtarpayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1094: tena tṛptā bhaviṣyāmo yāvatkalpaśataṃ gatam // VamPSm_15.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:1096: caturdaśyāṃ tu madhyāhne piṇḍado muktimāpnuyāt // VamPSm_15.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:1103: etaiḥ sametya tatkuṇḍaṃ kalpitaṃ bhuvi durlabham /
GP12vampsm_u:1107: devān pitṝn samuddiśya yo vipraṃ bhojayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1108: pitarastasya sukhitā dāsyanti bhuvi durlabham // VamPSm_15.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:1110: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca prasādena saptalokādhipo bhavet // VamPSm_15.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:1112: yasmin sthitaḥ khayaṃ devo vṛddhakedārasaṃjñitaḥ // VamPSm_15.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:1116: diṇḍidevaṃ namaskṛtya kedārasya phalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:1119: kalasyāṃ tu tato gacched yatra devī svayaṃ sthitā /
GP12vampsm_u:1120: durgā kātyāyanī bhadrā nidrā māyā sanātanī // VamPSm_15.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:1121: kalasyāṃ ca naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā durgā taṭe sthitām /
GP12vampsm_u:1124: kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśyāṃ dṛṣṭvā devaṃ maheśvaram // VamPSm_15.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:1126: tisrāḥ koṭyastu tīrthānāṃ sarake dvijasattamāḥ // VamPSm_15.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:1128: tasmin sare ca yaḥ snātvā rudrakoṭiṃ smarennaraḥ // VamPSm_15.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:1132: iḍāspadaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ pāpabhayāpaham // VamPSm_15.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:1137: tatra snātvā tu puruṣaḥ sarvadānaphalaṃ labhet /
GP12vampsm_u:1138: kiṃrūpaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ tatraiva bhuvi durlabham // VamPSm_15.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:1142: tiryagyonau sthito viṣṇuḥ siṃheṣu ratimāpnuvan // VamPSm_15.29 //
GP12vampsm_u:1143: tato devāḥ sagandharvā ārāghya varadaṃ śivam /
GP12vampsm_u:1147: yudhyamānau tu tau devau patitau saramadhyataḥ // VamPSm_15.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:1151: tau dṛṣṭvā tatra puruṣau tuṣṭāva bhaktibhāvitaḥ // VamPSm_15.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:1153: haraye ca umābhartre sthitikālabhṛte namaḥ // VamPSm_15.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:1156: dhanyo 'haṃ sukṛtī nityaṃ yad dṛṣṭo puruṣottamau /
GP12vampsm_u:1159: ya ihāgatya snātvā ca pitṝn saṃtarpayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1161: aśvatthasya tu yanmūlaṃ sadā tatra vasāmyaham /
GP12vampsm_u:1162: aśvatthavandanaṃ kṛtvā yamaṃ raudraṃ na paśyati // VamPSm_15.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:1164: pauṇḍarīke naraḥ snātvā puṇḍarīkaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:1166: snānaṃ japaṃ tathā śrāddhaṃ muktimārgapradāyakam // VamPSm_15.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:1168: tatra vaitaraṇī puṇyā nadī pāpapramocanī // VamPSm_15.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:1174: pūjayitvā śivaṃ tatra pāpalepo na vidyate // VamPSm_15.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:1176: yatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ sādhyāśca ṛṣayaḥ sthitāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1178: dṛṣadvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā tarpayitvā ca devatāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1180: somakṣaye ca saṃprāpte somasya ca dine tathā /
GP12vampsm_u:1181: yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute martyastasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu // VamPSm_15.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:1182: gayāyāṃ ca yatā śrāddha pitṛn prīṇāti nityaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1183: tathā śrāddhaṃ ca kartavyaṃ phalakīvanamāśritaiḥ // VamPSm_15.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:1185: tasyāpi pitarastṛptiṃ prayāsyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:1187: tasmin snātastu puruṣo gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:1188: pāṇikhāte naraḥ snātvā pitṛn saṃtarpya mānavaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1189: avāpnuyād rājasūyaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca vindati // VamPSm_15.51 //
GP12vampsm_u:1191: tatra tīrthāni muninā miśritāni mahātmanā // VamPSm_15.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:1193: sarvatīrtheṣu sa snāti miśrake snāti yo naraḥ // VamPSm_15.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:1195: manojave naraḥ snātvā miśrake snāti yo naraḥ // VamPSm_15.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:1196: manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1197: gatvā madhuvaṭīṃ caiva devyāstīrthaṃ naraḥ śuciḥ // VamPSm_15.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:1198: tatra snātvār'cayed devān pitṝṃśca prayato naraḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1199: sa devyā samanujñāto yathā siddhiṃ labhennaraḥ // VamPSm_15.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:1202: tato vyāsasthalī nāma yatra vyāsena dhīmatā /
GP12vampsm_u:1205: abhigamya sthalīṃ tasya putraśokaṃ na vindati // VamPSm_15.59 //
GP12vampsm_u:1208: yahnaṃ ca sudinaṃ caiva dve tīrthe bhuvi durlabhe /
GP12vampsm_u:1210: kṛtajapyaṃ tato gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12vampsm_u:1211: tatrābhiṣekaṃ kuvīnta gaṅgāyāṃ prayataḥ sthitaḥ // VamPSm_15.62 //
GP12vampsm_u:1213: koṭitīrthaṃ ca tatraiva dṛṣṭvā koṭīśvaraṃ prabhum // VamPSm_15.63 //
GP12vampsm_u:1215: tato vāmanakaṃ gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam // VamPSm_15.64 //
GP12vampsm_u:1221: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā naro muktiṃ saṃprayāti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.67 //
GP12vampsm_u:1223: dvādaśyāṃ ca naraḥ snātvā jyeṣṭhatvaṃ labhate nṛpu // VamPSm_15.68 //
GP12vampsm_u:1226: tebhyo dattāni śrāddhāni dānāni vividhāni ca /
GP12vampsm_u:1228: tatraiva koṭitīrthaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12vampsm_u:1229: tasmistīrthe naraḥ snātvā koṭiyajñaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.71 //
GP12vampsm_u:1232: tatraiva sumahat tīrthaṃ sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1233: tasmin snātvā bhaktibhuktaḥ sūryaloke mahīyate // VamPSm_15.73 //
GP12vampsm_u:1238: te 'pi tattīrthamāsādya paśyanti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_15.75 //
GP12vampsm_u:1240: kulāni tārayet snātaḥ sapta sapta ca sapta ca // VamPSm_15.76 //
GP12vampsm_u:1241: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ sūdrā ye tatparāyaṇāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1242: snātā bhaktiyutāḥ sarve paśyanti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_15.77 //

GP12vampsm_u:2446: candrādityau cakṣuṣī te bhavān hi tvameva cāgniḥ prapitāmahaśca /
GP12vampsm_u:2447: ārādhya tvāṃ sarakhatīṃ vāglabhante ahorātre nimiṣonmeṣakartā // VamPSm_26.145 //
GP12vampsm_u:2448: na brahmā na ca govindaḥ paurāṇā ṛṣayo na te /
GP12vampsm_u:2449: māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā yātātathyena śaṅkara // VamPSm_26.146 //
GP12vampsm_u:2451: mahatastamasaḥ pāre goptā mantā bhavān sadā // VamPSm_26.147 //
GP12vampsm_u:2453: jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānāstasmai yogātmane namaḥ // VamPSm_26.148 //
GP12vampsm_u:2454: yā mūrtayaśca sūkṣmāste na śakyā yā nidarśitum /
GP12vampsm_u:2455: tābhirmāṃ satataṃ rakṣa pitā putramivaurasam // VamPSm_26.149 //
GP12vampsm_u:2456: rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo 'haṃ tavānagha namo 'stu te /
GP12vampsm_u:2457: bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktaścāhaṃ sadā tvayi // VamPSm_26.150 //
GP12vampsm_u:2464: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoryaḥ somaṃ pibate niśi /
GP12vampsm_u:2465: grasatyarkaṃ ca kharbhānū rakṣitastava tejasā // VamPSm_26.154 //
GP12vampsm_u:2466: ye cātra patitā garbhā rudragandhasya rakṣeṇa /
GP12vampsm_u:2467: namaste 'stu khadhā khāhā prāpnuvanti tadadbhute // VamPSm_26.155 //
GP12vampsm_u:2469: rakṣantu te hi māṃ nityaṃ te māmāpyāyayantu vai // VamPSm_26.156 //
GP12vampsm_u:2470: ye nadīṣu samudreṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2474: ye ca pañcasu bhūteṣu diśāsu vidiśāsu ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2476: rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca tasmāt paraṃ gatāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2478: yeṣāṃ na vidyate saṃkhyā pramāṇaṃ rūpameva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2480: prasīda mama bhadraṃ te tava bhāvagatasya ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2481: tvayi me hṛdayaṃ deva tvayi buddhirmatistvayi // VamPSm_26.162 //
GP12vampsm_u:2482: stutvaivaṃ sa mahādevaṃ virarāma dvijottmaḥ // VamPSm_26.163 //
GP12vampsm_u:2487: aho tuṣṭo 'smi te rājan stavenānena suvrata /
GP12vampsm_u:2489: uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ mama gātrodbhavaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2490: asuro hyandhako nāma bhaviṣyasi surāntakṛt // VamPSm_27.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:2494: dehaṃ śulena hatvāhaṃ pāvayiṣyāmi samārbudam // VamPSm_27.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:2495: tatrāpyakalmaṣo bhūtvā stutvā māṃ bhaktitaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2496: khyātogaṇādhipo bhūtvā nāmnā bhṛṅgiriṭiḥ smṛtaḥ // VamPSm_27.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:2497: matsannidhāne sthitvā tvaṃ tataḥ siddhiṃ gamiṣyasi /
GP12vampsm_u:2498: venaproktaṃ stavamimaṃ kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti ca // VamPSm_27.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:2500: yathā sarveṣu deveṣu viśiṣṭo bhagavāñśivaḥ // VamPSm_27.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:2506: anenaiva tu dehena gaṇānāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ vrajet // VamPSm_27.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:2507: tejasā yaśasā caiva yukto bhavati nirmalaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2508: na rākṣasāḥ piśācā vā na bhūtā na vināyakāḥ // VamPSm_27.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:2509: vighnaṃ kuryurgṛhe tatra yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2510: śruṇuyād yā stavaṃ nārī anujñāṃ prāpya bhartṛtaḥ // VamPSm_27.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:2511: mātṛpakṣe pituḥ pakṣe pūjyā bhavati devavat /
GP12vampsm_u:2512: śruṇuyād yaḥ stavaṃ divyaṃ kīrtayed vā samāhitaḥ // VamPSm_27.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:2513: tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇa siddhiṃ gacchanti nityaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2514: manasā cintitaṃ yacca yacca vācānukīrtitam // VamPSm_27.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:2517: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yattvayā manasepsitam // VamPSm_27.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:2519: asya liṅgasya māhātmyāt tathā liṅgasya darśanāt /
GP12vampsm_u:2520: mukto 'haṃ pātakaiḥ sarvaistava darśanataḥ kila // VamPSm_27.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:2521: yadi tuṣṭo 'si me deva yadi deyo varo mama /
GP12vampsm_u:2527: tasyaitad vacanaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭaḥ provāca śaṅkaraḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2528: eṣo 'pi pāpinirmukto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_27.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:2530: tathā stavamimaṃ śrutvā mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // VamPSm_27.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:2532: mama liṅgasya cotpattiṃ śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_27.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:2536: sa ca śvā tatkṣaṇādeva smṛtvā janma purātanam /
GP12vampsm_u:2539: sthāṇatīrthe kuṭīṃ śūnyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokasamanvitaḥ // VamPSm_27.26 //
GP12vampsm_u:2541: satputreṇa tvayā vatsa trāto 'haṃ narakārmavāt // VamPSm_27.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:2543: asya sādhoḥ prasādena sthāṇordevasya darśanāt // VamPSm_27.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:2544: muktāpāpaśca svarlokaṃ yāsye yatra śivaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2546: sthāṇutīrthe yayau siddhiṃ tena putreṇa tāritaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2547: sa ca śvā paramāṃ siddhiṃ sthāṇutīrthaprabhāvataḥ // VamPSm_27.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:2552: suhṛdo 'tha ṛṇairmuktvā kāmaiḥ saṃtarpya ca striyaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2553: abhiṣicya sutaṃ rājye kurukṣetraṃ yayau nṛpaḥ // VamPSm_27.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:2554: tatra taptvā tapo ghoraṃ pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram /
GP12vampsm_u:2555: ātmecchayā tanuṃ tyaktvā prayātaḥ paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_27.34 //
